messages.title: Richard Benwell Sets The Pace
messages.content: Local man and environment expert is taking on Boris Johnson’s Conservative candidate from London.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Leading environmental expert Dr. Richard Benwell is winning support across the Wantage constituency.

mentions.candidate: Local man and environment expert is taking on Boris Johnson’s Conservative candidate from London.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Boris Johnson’s Conservative candidate from London
mentions.tacticalSituation: The election here in Wantage constituency is turning into a “two horse race” between Lib Dem Dr. Richard Benwell and the Conservative candidate from London.

issues.brexitEurope: A fantastic response to our campaign
issues.environment: Leading environmental expert Dr. Richard Benwell is winning support across the Wantage constituency.

community.content: It is great to be able to travel round the constituency and see our Lib Dem diamonds springing up everywhere.
